archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.7d: d) taking control of personal information (e.g. by resisting the urge to make a blog entry when tired or upset and avoiding publication of work-related information on websites)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
